## Runtime.ResourceResolver.compareResolvedConditions() method

Compares two resolved conditions by their index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
compareResolvedConditions(c1Index: number, c2Index: number): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The index of the first condition.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

c2Index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The index of the second condition.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The comparison result.

## Exceptions

An error if either condition has an invalid index or has not been resolved.
